name: Herding Cats (Bobo_Baqa, bern_dog, SADragonMaker, botmark)
description:
WASD to Move
E to Yell

A dinosaur egg has been discovered underneath an inconspicuous field in rural Georgia. A crack team of feline experts has been dispatched to hatch the egg using their comfy vibrations. As the canine handler of these mischievous agents, you must work to keep them on task as well as ward off those who would disrupt the operation.
